keyword: how many calories are in flour
title: How Many Calories Are in Flour?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in flour per 100 g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and other nutrients for all-purpose flour, with tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Flour?
assumptions: All-purpose white flour, unenriched, sifted; standard dry measurement.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (e.g., whole wheat, bleached), brand, and enrichment; check labels for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of all-purpose flour contains ~364 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in flour per 100 g?
What are the carbs in flour?
faqs.a: Roughly 76 g carbs per 100 g, with 2.7 g fiber.
Moderate at ~10 g protein per 100 g; bread flour has more.

faqs.q: How does whole wheat flour compare calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Slightly higher at ~374 kcal per 100 g, with more fiber.

faqs.q: Are there calories in different types of flour?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”almond flour is ~579 kcal per 100 g due to higher fat.
